Articles.Content: Hello people of ksp! I have been having a problem with loading up ksp. its in both 1.2.2 and 1.3, and here are the mods I have: BDArmory, Cameratools, Hullcam VDS and scatterer. How do I post the crash log? thanks.

If the game crashed new folder created in your game folder with a timestamp like 2017-06-03_201024 inside that folder 2 text files you need to zip + in your game folder KSP.log file in the end you got 3 text files

KSP.log - game folder

error.log - game folder / 2017-06-03_201024

output_log - game folder / 2017-06-03_201024

if you zip they will be really small

 

And did you installed manually or through CKAN?

Edited June 3, 2017 by AlimOncul

I found the culpirt- its BDArmory.. They didnt make a 1.3 version, and it crashed my game as it was loading. I removed it, and it runs fine. Oh- and I installed it manually.

P.S.- Saw jupiter and 2 of its moons tonight- First time! looked fake because it was so cool!
